In England, in the seven days to 07 July, there were 179,440 new confirmed cases (318.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 June, there were 126,220 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 42% (53,220 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 July is 4,480,518 (7,960.1 cases per 100,000 population).
